title: I just had to play vs banner rush lulu mid as ap ezreal
body: Killed her twice then she took my inhib tower with a fucking empowered cannon minion that took 4 people to kill.

replies.body:
>  ap ezreal

Worst waveclear in the game, probably.

>  banner rush lulu

Lulu outplayed you hard.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0owBpJ6c,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-01T22:39:01.513+0000)
>
> Worst waveclear in the game, probably.
> 
> Lulu outplayed you hard.

Have you played against the new Banner?  It's broken AF.  It took me 30 seconds to kill as Jax.
70% DR to champions is a lot less broken than it used to be, just less situational.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0owBpJ6c,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-01T23:08:43.464+0000)
>
> 70% DR to champions is a lot less broken than it used to be, just less situational.

How?  It's extremely broken.  There was always at least 1 person on the team that could shred the old banner minion.  Now it takes forever for everyone.
Actually no and is busted right now.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0owBpJ6c,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-01T22:39:01.513+0000)
>
> Worst waveclear in the game, probably.
> 
> Lulu outplayed you hard.

while this is true she got dumpstered in lane but moment she got banner i couldnt stop her push or kill her, id just get polymorphed an shed ult/shield my burst and run away. and the minion is so fucking hard to kill as anyone.
